article.title: AAI Supports Shadow UAS in Afghanistan and Australia
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AAI Corporation, Hunt Valley, Maryland, was awarded an $180.9 million cost-plus-incentive-fee for the sustainment services in support of the RQ-7B Shadow unmanned aircraft systems. Work will be performed in Hunt Valley, Maryland, Afghanistan and Australia with an estimated completion date of October 31, 2012. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
